page.title: 19Attitudes to the Locality.
page.content: We found that satisfaction with the area ius high - only 4% could think of nothing they liked. While access to town (l5%) and good public transport (l7%) are important, it is access to the countryside (32%) people like most. With those who referred to the pleasant appearance of parks and gardens (26%) and the tidiness of the area (5%) then it is clear that the quality of the environment is a major factor in peoples' lives. In Whickham it is the village atmosphere (27%) and quiet (20%) people like most - although quiet in Lobley Hill (2%) seems rarer.There it is access to shops and local facilities (50%) which matter most. But happily to l5% it is still community feeling and the friendliness of people they like best.
